Sentencas: The present research study presents the optimization of Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) power plants directly fed by biogas.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of biogas fed solid oxide fuel cell power plants

Sentencas: By considering energy and exergy balances for such a system, a detailed thermodynamic model (THERMAS) was designed and implemented.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of biogas fed solid oxide fuel cell power plants

Sentencas: A specific SOFC-based system was selected as case study, equipped with three heat exchangers (preheaters), a reformer, a SOFC-stack system and an afterburner.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of biogas fed solid oxide fuel cell power plants

Sentencas: The use of the simulation tool THERMAS give us the opportunity to investigate all the appropriate parameters that affect system's efficiency based on exergy analysis while incorporating a detailed parametric analysis regarding the whole system.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of biogas fed solid oxide fuel cell power plants

Sentencas: The optimization process relies on the difference between the energy and exergy efficiency by considering an innovative Optimization Factor (OPF) for each simulated system, which is dynamically affected by operational parameters, such as fuel composition, extension of chemical reactions and temperatures.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of biogas fed solid oxide fuel cell power plants

Sentencas: It is found that the use of a pure fuels seems to be meaningless without optimization.
Titulo: Thermodynamic analysis of biogas fed solid oxide fuel cell power plants
